name: Alex Doe
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience designing and deploying high-performance, scalable backend systems in Rust, Go, and Python. Expertise in cloud-native architecture, distributed systems, and DevOps. Committed to writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Led the design of a microservices architecture in Rust, improving system performance by 40% and reducing latency by 60ms.
Developed and maintained critical data processing APIs handling over 1 million requests per minute.
Mentored junior engineers, conducted code reviews, and established team-wide best practices for Rust development.
Automated deployments with Kubernetes and GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time from hours to minutes.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed backend services in Go and Python for a large-scale data analytics platform.
Improved data ingestion service throughput by 25% through targeted performance optimizations.
Collaborated with front-end teams to define and implement RESTful APIs for new product features.
Participated in on-call rotation to ensure the reliability and uptime of production systems.

skills.list: Tokio, Axum, Actix-Web, Gin, Django, React
Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, GCP, Terraform, Git, GitHub Actions, Prometheus, Grafana

projects.name: Petty PDF Generator
